ygData.subject: RE: clothing variation (was Stun issue)
ygData.msgSnippet: It s just a silk evening tunic (no black mentioned). It s +5 charisma and it s available for about 2pp from the woman in the marketplace in South Qeynos (I
ygData.messageBody:
It's just a "silk evening tunic" (no black mentioned). It's +5 charisma and
it's available for about 2pp from the woman in the marketplace in South
Qeynos (I forget her name).

The graphic looks just like a newbie tunic, and it doesn't show up on your
figure as far as I can tell.

Elbeno

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Slithey Tove [mailto:slithey@...]

> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Stun issue
>

> From: "Slithey Tove" <slithey@...>

> The dress idea is interesting. There is an item indexed on
> EQ'izer called a
> 'black silk evening tunic'. It increases your charisma, but
> isn't very good
> armor. ^_^ Forget where it comes from. Anyone seen anyone
> wearing one? What
> does it look like? Is it strapless?
